titles.title: Returning to the Senate the bill H.R. 2500.

action.text: DEBATE - The resolution raised a question of the privileges of the House and the House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 240.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/21/2001--Introduced. Returns to the Senate H.R. 2500 (FY 2002 Departments of Commerce, Justice, and State, and the Judiciary, and related agencies appropriations) because, in the opinion of the House of Representatives, it contravenes the Constitution and infringes upon the privileges of the House.
